name: Unconscious
description: An unconscious creature is incapacitated, prone, can't move, drops held items, and is unaware. Attacks within 5 feet are automatic critical hits.

effects.description: While you have the Unconscious condition, you experience the following effects.
mechanicalEffects: You have the Incapacitated and Prone conditions, and you drop whatever you're holding. When this condition ends, you remain Prone
Your Speed is 0 and can't increase
Attack rolls against you have Advantage
You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity saving throws
Any attack roll that hits you is a Critical Hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of you
